description: The Foray 3-in-1 Parka is a protective and versatile Gore-Tex® Paclite waterproof parka, with an insulated zip-in zip-out liner jacket for adaptable warmth. Worn together, the shell and liner are perfect for winter cold and snow. The shell alone is ideal for spring and fall rain storms. The liner jacket alone is a versatile insulator for cool dry days. No all-in-one outerwear system is better.
name: Outdoor Research Foray 3-in-1 Parka - Mens
